headline.main: VICHY SAID TO PLAN DEMARCATION DEAL; Berne Reports Atlantic Coast Strip Transfer to Nazis for Territorial Gain in North HITLER-DARLAN TALK CITED Paris Press Indicates Reich Is Not Displeased With the Increasing London Tension

lead_paragraph: BERNE, Switzerland, June 1 -- There were persistent rumors in diplomatic quarters here today that the Vichy government is actively preparing to withdraw its "frontier authorities" a further twenty-five kilometers [a kilometer is .621 of a mile] eastward from the strip of occupied territory along the Atlantic coast.
abstract: Berne diplomatic qrs repts Atlantic coast strip transfer to Germans to allow German troop passage to Spain frontier; Hitler-Darlan talk discussed
